動物用藥品名稱: 海博萊雞新城病、傳染性支氣管炎活毒混合疫苗
業者名稱: 西班牙商海博萊大藥廠股份有限公司台灣分公司
效能(適應症): 預防雞感染新城病及傳染性支氣管炎。
ingredients: ACTIVE INGREDIENT: LIVE NEWCASTLE DISEASEVIRUS B1 STRAIN:  10^6.5-10^7.8 EID50; LIVE INFECTIOUS BRONCHITIS VIRUS MASS H-120 STRAIN :10^3-10^5 EID50; CONSTITUENTS OF THE ADJUVANT: DISODIUM PHOSPHATEDODECAHYDRATE 0.00290MG; POTASSIUM DIHYDROGEN PHOSPHATE 0.00020MG;GELATIN 0.04000MG; POLYVIDONE 0.05000MG;SODIUM CHLORIDE 0.00080MG;SUCROSE 0.15000MG; MONOSODIUM GLUTAMATE 0.01000MG; POTASSIUMGLUTAMATE 0.01000MG; CONSTITUENTS OF THE DILUENT WATER FORINJECTIONS 加至 0.03ML.
